itemDescription: English ecclesiastical historian and a senior layperson in the Church of England

wikipedia_page.main: Colin John Podmore  (born 22 February 1960) is an English ecclesiastical historian and a senior layperson in the Church of England. Between April 2013 and February 2020 he was the director of Forward in Faith, a traditionalist Anglo-Catholic organization within the church. He was previously the secretary of the House of Clergy of the General Synod (2002–2011) and clerk to the General Synod (2011–2013).

link_mentions.page: Moravian Church of the British Province
response: In 1999, there were 2,914 members. (Colin Podmore, Moravian Episcopate: A Personal Response, p. 378).

In 1998, she was the recipient of a Festschrift titled "Community, Unity, Communion: Essays in Honour of Mary Tanner" and edited by Colin Podmore.Colin Podmore, ed. (1998). Community, Unity, Communion: Essays in Honour of Mary Tanner. London: Church House Publishing. .
